title: Low priority queue due to servers problem
body: So I was on my plat1-diamond 5 promotion yesterday, was 2 win 2loss on my last game towards diamond 5,and somehow couldnt connect to game once the b/p ended,at first i thought it was my nets problem so i asked my friends to log on the account for me,and they were experiencing the same problem as mine. And now im placed in low priority queue for 5 games and a bit worried that i might get my end of season reward cancelled due to this problem since its not my fault. Any advice? I do however understand that i need to climb back to promotion again and i have no problem with it since im diamond last season as well as in Chinese Server.

replies.body: I have the exact same problem, Had super lag and disconnected and now i have another 5 game ban, just after comming out of one.

>i might get my end of season reward cancelled

The conditions are not released to the public up until the reward is distributed, if there is one at all. In order to avoid missing out on it, you should behave well in all aspects of the game at all times, not just whether you leave games or not.

Unfortunately, it's the server's fault, but you won't be able to remove that leave from your profile. There isn't much that can be done. If you'd like to, try bringing it up with support and see if they can set it so it's less likely to happen again in the future.

Best of luck.
